statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 50;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points < 10;
SELECT customer_id, points, redemption_history FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points < 50 ORDER BY points ASC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE LENGTH(rewards) > 0;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 200;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT customer_id, points_balance FROM points ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM redemption_history WHERE redeemed_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, redeem_date FROM redemption_history WHERE redeem_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(redeemed_points) AS total_points_redeemed FROM redemption_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE points_balance > 100 ORDER BY point_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points_balance) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT redemption_id, customer_id, redeem_date FROM redemption_history WHERE redeemed_points > 500 ORDER BY redeem_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(redeemed_points) AS total_redemption FROM redemption_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_redemption > 1000;

SELECT customer_id, points_balance, reward_name FROM points JOIN redemption_history ON points.customer_id = redemption_history.customer_id WHERE points.points_balance > 50 AND redemption_history.redeemed_points < 1000 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM points ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM points WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT reward_description, required_points FROM rewards ORDER BY required_points DESC
SELECT customer_id, redemption_date FROM redemption_history WHERE redemption_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, reward_description FROM points JOIN redemption_history ON points.customer_id = redemption_history.customer_id JOIN rewards ON redemption_history.reward_id = rewards.reward_id
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM points WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT reward_id, reward_description, required_points FROM rewards ORDER BY required_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id, redemption_date FROM redemption_history WHERE redemption_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY redemption_date ASC;
SELECT r.reward_description, p.total_points FROM rewards r JOIN points p ON p.total_points >= r.required_points;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, tier_level FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT reward_name, description FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, total_points_earned, total_points_redeemed FROM customer_statistics;
SELECT customer_id, redemption_id, redemption_date FROM redemption_history ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE tier_level = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_points_earned) AS total_points_earned FROM customer_statistics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points_earned > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, redemption_date FROM redemption_history WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY redemption_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, email_notifications, sms_notifications FROM customer_preferences WHERE email_notifications = true;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;

SELECT r.reward_name, rh.redemption_date, l.customer_id FROM rewards r JOIN redemption_history rh ON r.reward_id = rh.reward_id JOIN loyalty_program l ON l.customer_id = rh.customer_id WHERE l.total_points >= 5000;
